statements: SELECT * FROM survey_feedback WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback FROM survey_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback FROM survey_feedback WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT survey_id, user_id, rating FROM survey_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback WHERE user_id = 1 AND rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM survey_feedback WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT survey_id, user_id FROM survey_feedback WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT survey_id, feedback FROM survey_feedback WHERE user_id = 3 AND rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback WHERE user_id = 4 AND (rating < 3 OR feedback LIKE '%improve%');
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT respondent_name, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT respondent_name, response_text, survey_date FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT response_id, result_value FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id = 12345;
SELECT survey_id, response_id, result_value FROM SurveyResults WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT MAX(result_value) AS max_result_value, respondent_name FROM SurveyResults JOIN SurveyResponses ON SurveyResults.response_id = SurveyResponses.id GROUP BY respondent_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE response_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY response_date;
SELECT analyst_name, analysis_text FROM analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM responses WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_name, analyst_name FROM surveys JOIN analysis ON surveys.survey_id = analysis.survey_id;
SELECT DISTINCT respondent_name FROM responses WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, analysis_text FROM surveys JOIN analysis ON surveys.survey_id = analysis.survey_id WHERE analysis_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT survey_id, response_text FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM survey_participants WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM survey_participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM survey_questions WHERE survey_id = 4;

SELECT s.question_text, r.response_text, p.participant_name FROM survey_results sr JOIN survey_questions s ON sr.question_id = s.question_id JOIN survey_responses r ON sr.response_id = r.response_id JOIN survey_participants p ON sr.participant_id = p.participant_id WHERE sr.survey_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, respondent_name FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT survey_name, creation_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM survey_participants WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice';
SELECT survey_name, creation_date FROM surveys WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions WHERE survey_id = 3 ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT response_text FROM survey_responses JOIN responses_ratings ON survey_responses.response_id = responses_ratings.response_id WHERE rating > 3;

SELECT respondent_name, response_date FROM survey_responses JOIN survey_participants ON survey_responses.survey_id = survey_participants.survey_id WHERE participant_name = 'John' ORDER BY response_date ASC;
